planet.description: 55 Cancri is a binary system in the constellation Cancer. 55 Cnc b and c are in a near 1:3 resonance. A dynamical analysis shows that the system has to be almost coplanar in order to be stable for the age the system.

55 Cancri is a binary system in the constellation Cancer. 55 Cnc b and c are in a near 1:3 resonance. A dynamical analysis shows that the system has to be almost coplanar in order to be stable for the age the system.
